postMessage-tracker.Data: | Chrome/postMessage | [postMessage-tracker](https://github.com/fransr/postMessage-tracker) | A Chrome Extension to track postMessage usage (url, domain and stack) both by logging using CORS and also visually as an extension-icon | ![](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/fransr/postMessage-tracker) | ![](https://img.shields.io/github/languages/top/fransr/postMessage-tracker) |
postMessage-tracker.Description: A Chrome Extension to track postMessage usage (url, domain and stack) both by logging using CORS and also visually as an extension-icon
